std_inline.citation:
'''Burial''': "eGGSA Burial, Cremation and Death Registers, Maria Magdalena Elizabeth Vosloo"
Source: East London - West Bank Cemetery, East London, Eastern Cape, burial register, 1854-2008, page . Repository: West Bank Cemetery. Transcribed by Brian Barrett and Colin Levey, from official records Note: The West Bank Cemetery is one of the three larger cemeteries serving the residents of East London, the other two being the Old East Bank Cemetery and The Cambridge Cemetery. The West Bank Cemetery lies at 30° 02' 22.00 s. And 27° 53' 59.00 e. Is close to the well known Hood Point lighthouse and alongside the West Bank golf course. There are approximately 100 children, 1000 single and 1800 double or family burial plots in this cemetery and approximately 3425 people have been buried there to date. Data transcribed from the original burial registers, still in possesion of the cemetery, by Brian Barrett and Colin Levey
[https://www.eggsa.org/cgi-bin/dosearchBurials.pl eGGSA BMD Record] with search parameters Surname: vosloo, First Name: maria in all the registers. (accessed 6 May 2021)
Maria Magdalena Elizabeth Vosloo burial (died in 1958 at age 50) in 1958.
